idea-plugin.name: Vipassana
idea-plugin.description:
This is my initial tryout of creating an IntelliJ theme, inspired by Qiita theme that exists in VSCode.
There are still a couple of things to do/fix. Before doing a bad rating, :) please raise an issue, and I'll try to solve it.
All is and will be done in [this repo](https://github.com/devisions/intellij-vipassana-theme).
